name: GitHub Copilot
about: An AI pair programmer that suggests code completions, functions, and documentation as you type.
summary: Code faster and smarter with an AI assistant in your IDE.
details: GitHub Copilot integrates directly with editors like VS Code, using OpenAI’s Codex model to autocomplete code and generate functions in real time.
howTo: Install the GitHub Copilot extension in VS Code.
Log in with your GitHub account and enable Copilot.
Start typing — suggestions will appear automatically.
Accept or modify AI-generated code to fit your needs.
